name: Breathing Activity
description: This activity will help you relax by walking your through breathing in and out slowly. Clear your mind and focus on your breathing.

name: Reflection Activity
description: This activity will help you reflect on times in your life when you have shown strength and resilience. Take a moment to reflect!

name: Listing Activity
description: This activity will help you reflect on the good things in your life by having you list as many things as you can.
